Name: Complete Order for Samsung and iPhone Products
Description: Navigate to the homepage, select Samsung and iPhone products, and add them to the cart. Fill in the checkout information and complete the order, verifying the thank you page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link Samsung -> Navigate to page 'category#category/*'
Step 3: Click on link SamsungGalaxyS23Ultra -> Navigate to page 'product#product/*'
Step 4: Click on label colorStorageOption (TB)
Step 5: Click on label colorStorageOption (White)
Step 6: Click on label colorStorageOption (Black)
Step 7: Click on label colorStorageOption (256GB)
Step 8: Click on button Buy
Step 9: Click on link iPhone15Pro
Step 10: Click on button Buy
Step 11: Click on link PlaceAnOrder -> Navigate to page 'cart#cart'
Step 12: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout info#checkout/info'
Step 13: Click on input Email
Step 14: Enter input value in input Email
Step 15: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout#checkout/shipping-address'
Step 16: Click on input FirstName
Step 17: Enter input value in input FirstName
Step 18: Click on input LastName
Step 19: Enter input value in input LastName
Step 20: Click on input Address
Step 21: Enter input value in input Address
Step 22: Click on input ZipCode
Step 23: Enter input value in input ZipCode
Step 24: Click on input City
Step 25: Enter input value in input City
Step 26: Click on input State
Step 27: Enter input value in input State
Step 28: Click on input Phone
Step 29: Enter input value in input Phone
Step 30: Click on button ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout#checkout/payment'
Step 31: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank you#thank-you/*'
Step 32: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
